content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

DROP TABLE [wwi].[FactMovement]

CREATE TABLE [wwi].[FactMovement]
( 
	[MovementKey] [bigint]  NOT NULL,
	[DateKey] [date]  NOT NULL,
	[StockItemKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[CustomerKey] [int]  NULL,
	[SupplierKey] [int]  NULL,
	[TransactionTypeKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[WWIStockItemTransactionID] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[WWIInvoiceID] [int]  NULL,
	[WWIPurchaseOrderID] [int]  NULL,
	[Quantity] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[LineageKey] [int]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [CustomerKey] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

COPY INTO wwi.FactMovement
(MovementKey 1, DateKey 2, StockItemKey 3, CustomerKey 4, SupplierKey 5, TransactionTypeKey 6, WWIStockItemTransactionID 7, WWIInvoiceID 8, WWIPurchaseOrderID 9, Quantity 10, LineageKey 11)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-factmovement.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.FactMovement
GO
